title: Add Generator page route to worker.tsx
close_reason: Added /generator route to worker.tsx with AppLayout and Generator page import

title: Logo Generation Agent - Phase 3: Agent in Container
close_reason: Phase 3 Agent in Container complete: FastAPI app with /generate and /validate endpoints, Node.js logo generator script, TanStack AI generateLogo tool connected via getContainer() and LOGO_AGENT binding

title: Integrate RAG with logo generation agent
description: Modify logo generation flow to query RAG before generation. Feed similar logo descriptions to agent context. Format examples as structured list with LogoConfig + description.

title: Install TanStack AI packages
close_reason: Implemented Phase 2: TanStack AI Integration - installed packages, created chat handler with anthropicText adapter, defined generateLogo tool with Zod schema, built FeedbackChat component with useChat hook

title: Add admin API key authentication
description: Protect admin endpoints with X-API-Key header authentication. Store API keys in Workers secrets. Rate limit to 100 ingests/hour per key.

title: Logo RAG System with ChromaDB
description: Add a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system to improve logo generation quality by providing similar logo examples from a curated database. SVG logos are ingested, described using Claude Vision, embedded via Workers AI, and stored in ChromaDB Cloud for semantic retrieval.

title: Create Claude Vision logo describer
description: Create src/lib/logo-describer.ts that sends PNG to Claude Vision API with structured prompt to extract LogoConfig-compatible metadata (type, shape, theme, colors, text) plus natural language description.

title: Implement /generate endpoint calling generate.js
close_reason: Phase 3 implementation complete: FastAPI app with /generate and /validate endpoints, Node.js generate.js script, TanStack AI tool connected to container via getContainer() with LOGO_AGENT binding

title: Logo Generation Agent - Phase 4: Config Panel & Preview
Build Gallery page with saved logos
Add SVG sanitization
description: Sanitize uploaded SVGs before processing: strip scripts, event handlers, external entities (XXE prevention). Enforce 5MB file size limit.

title: Add audit logging for admin operations
description: Log all admin operations (ingest, update, delete) with timestamp, admin ID, action, and affected logo IDs. Store in Durable Object SQLite or external logging service.

title: Implement anthropicText adapter and SSE streaming
close_reason: Implemented Phase 2: TanStack AI Integration - installed packages, created chat handler with anthropicText adapter, defined generateLogo tool with Zod schema, built FeedbackChat component with useChat hook

title: Create PreviewCanvas with zoom and export
Create ChromaDB types and client
description: Create src/lib/chroma-types.ts with LogoDocument interface and src/lib/chroma-client.ts with ChromaDB Cloud wrapper. Include metadata schema: logoConfig, description, svgR2Key, pngR2Key, source, industry, mood, createdAt.

title: Add image upload with R2 storage
Phase 3: RAG Query Integration
description: Integrate RAG queries with the logo generation agent. Query ChromaDB for similar logos and feed examples to the generation context.

title: Configure environment variables
description: Add CHROMA_API_KEY, CHROMA_TENANT, CHROMA_DATABASE, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY to wrangler.jsonc secrets and update environment types.

title: Create logo RAG query utility
description: Create src/lib/logo-rag.ts with queryChromaDB(query, options). Generate embedding via Workers AI, query ChromaDB for top-k similar logos (default k=5, min similarity 0.7).

title: Logo Generation Agent - Phase 2: TanStack AI Integration
close_reason: Implemented Phase 2: TanStack AI Integration - installed packages, created chat handler with anthropicText adapter, defined generateLogo tool with Zod schema, built FeedbackChat component with useChat hook

title: Logo Generation Agent - Phase 1: Foundation
close_reason: Phase 1 Foundation complete: wrangler config, container setup, Generator page with route and sidebar navigation, logo types and constants

title: Connect TanStack AI tool to container endpoint
close_reason: Phase 3 implementation complete: FastAPI app with /generate and /validate endpoints, Node.js generate.js script, TanStack AI tool connected to container via getContainer() with LOGO_AGENT binding

title: Create logo update endpoint
description: Create PATCH /api/admin/logos/:id endpoint. Allow updating metadata (description, industry, mood) without re-processing. Re-generate embedding if description changes.

title: Create LogoConfig to query generator
description: Create src/lib/query-generator.ts that converts LogoConfig to natural language query for embedding. Example: {type: 'abstract', theme: 'tech'} -> 'tech style, abstract logo'

title: Handle empty and degraded RAG scenarios
description: Gracefully fall back to non-RAG generation when: ChromaDB unavailable, no similar logos found, query timeout. Log warnings but don't block generation.

title: Create batch status polling endpoint
description: Create GET /api/admin/logos/status/:jobId endpoint. Return { total, completed, failed, inProgress, results: [] }.

title: Phase 4: Admin Management
description: Admin CRUD operations for managing the logo database - list, update, delete logos and metadata.

title: Configure wrangler.jsonc with Container and R2 bindings
close_reason: Configured wrangler.jsonc with Container binding (LogoAgentContainer), AI binding, and R2 buckets (LOGOS_BUCKET, UPLOADS_BUCKET)

title: Phase 2: Admin Ingestion API
description: Admin endpoints for uploading and ingesting SVG logos into ChromaDB, including single upload, batch processing with queue, and status polling.

title: Create single logo ingestion endpoint
description: Create POST /api/admin/logos/ingest endpoint. Accept SVG via body or multipart. Convert to PNG, describe with Claude Vision, embed with Workers AI, store in ChromaDB. Return { id, logoConfig }.

title: Create similar logos API endpoint
description: Create GET /api/logos/similar?type=abstract&theme=tech endpoint for testing RAG queries. Return top-k similar logos with similarity scores.

title: Define generateLogo tool with Zod schema
close_reason: Implemented Phase 2: TanStack AI Integration - installed packages, created chat handler with anthropicText adapter, defined generateLogo tool with Zod schema, built FeedbackChat component with useChat hook

title: Add SVG validation in container
close_reason: Phase 3 implementation complete: FastAPI app with /generate and /validate endpoints, Node.js generate.js script, TanStack AI tool connected to container via getContainer() with LOGO_AGENT binding

title: Create batch logo ingestion with queue
description: Create POST /api/admin/logos/batch endpoint. Accept multiple SVGs via multipart. Queue processing via Durable Objects. Return { jobId, total }. Process logos in background.

title: Install RAG dependencies
description: Add required npm packages: @aspect-tech/resvg-js (WASM SVG renderer), chromadb (vector DB client), @anthropic-ai/sdk (Claude Vision)

title: Phase 1: RAG Foundation
description: Core libraries and types for the RAG system including SVG to PNG conversion, ChromaDB client, logo description with Claude Vision, and query generation.

title: Create logo delete endpoint
description: Create DELETE /api/admin/logos/:id endpoint. Remove from ChromaDB, delete SVG/PNG from R2. Hard delete with no recovery.
